sentences: Greg Cohen (born July 13, 1953) is an American jazz bassist who has been a member of John Zorn's Masada quartet and worked with numerous other noted musicians for over four decades.
He has been a regular member of Woody Allen and his New Orleans Jazz Band, which played at the Carlyle Hotel in Manhattan.
He appeared in the documentary Wild Man Blues (directed by Barbara Kopple) about a 1996 European tour by Allen and his band.
Cohen appears in Robert Altman's 1993 film Short Cuts.
Astaroth: Book of Angels Volume 1 (Tzadik, 2004) with the Jamie Saft Trio
